description.title: üéØ You've selected a Recruiting notice!
description.content: If you're looking to recruit people to your club, group, or event, try creating a recruitment announcement.
description.example: Ex) club recruitment, student association recruitment, Infinite Challenge team member recruitment, contests, competitions, etc.

description.title: üéà You've selected an Event notice!
description.content: Feel free to promote your event in the event notice.
description.example: Ex) festivals, exhibitions, performances, seminars, lectures, workshops

description.title: üîî You've selected a General notice!
description.content: Notices that are not part of a recruitment or event notices.
description.example: Ex) GIST House notices, student association notices, notifications, etc.

write.writeTagsDescription: Separate them with a space; you don't need to type #.
write.photoDescription: The first of the attached photos is set as the representative photo.
write.submitDescription:
You can't edit your notice after submission.
 Please double-check your content before submitting.
